vc-preamble: def absInt (x : Int) : Int := if x < 0 then -x else x
vc-definitions:
def abs {n : Nat} (a : Vector Int n) : Vector Int n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem abs_spec {n : Nat} (a : Vector Int n) :
  (abs a).toList.length = n ∧
  (∀ i : Fin n, (abs a)[i] = Int.natAbs (a[i])) ∧
  (∀ i : Fin n, (abs a)[i] ≥ 0) :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def add {n : Nat} (a b : Vector Int n) : Vector Int n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem add_spec {n : Nat} (a b : Vector Int n) :
  (add a b).toList.length = n ∧
  ∀ i : Fin n, (add a b)[i] = a[i] + b[i] :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def arangeLength (start stop step : Float) : Nat :=
sorry

def arange (start stop step : Float)
    (h_step_nonzero : step ≠ 0)
    (h_valid_range : if step < 0 then start > stop else start < stop) :
    Vector Float (arangeLength start stop step) :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem arange_spec
  (start stop step : Float)
  (h_step_nonzero : step ≠ 0)
  (h_valid_range : if step < 0 then start > stop else start < stop) :
  let n := arangeLength start stop step
  let arr := arange start stop step h_step_nonzero h_valid_range
  n = ((stop - start) / step).floor.toUInt64.toNat
  ∧
  n > 0
  ∧
  arr[0]'(by sorry) = start
  ∧
  ∀ i : Fin n, i.val + 1 < n → arr[i.val + 1]'(by sorry) - arr[i.val] = step :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def argmax {n : Nat} (h : 0 < n) (arr : Vector Float n) : Fin n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem argmax_spec {n : Nat} (h : 0 < n) (arr : Vector Float n) :
  ∀ i : Fin n, i < argmax h arr → arr[argmax h arr] > arr[i]
  ∧
  ∀ i : Fin n, argmax h arr < i → arr[argmax h arr] ≥ arr[i]
  :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def argsort {n : Nat} (a : Vector Float n) : Vector (Fin n) n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem argsort_spec {n : Nat} (a : Vector Float n) :
  (argsort a).toList.length = n ∧
  (∀ i j : Fin n, i < j → a[(argsort a)[i]] ≤ a[(argsort a)[j]]) ∧
  (∀ i : Fin n, ∃ j : Fin n, (argsort a)[j] = i) :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def bitwiseAnd {n : Nat} (a b : Vector Nat n) : Vector Nat n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem bitwiseAnd_spec {n : Nat} (a b : Vector Nat n) :
  (bitwiseAnd a b).toList.length = n ∧
  ∀ i : Fin n, (bitwiseAnd a b)[i] = a[i] &&& b[i] :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def bitwiseOr {n : Nat} (a b : Vector Nat n) : Vector Nat n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem bitwiseOr_spec {n : Nat} (a b : Vector Nat n) :
  (bitwiseOr a b).toList.length = n ∧
  ∀ i : Fin n, (bitwiseOr a b)[i] = a[i] ||| b[i] :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def bitwiseXor {n : Nat} (a b : Vector Nat n) : Vector Nat n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem bitwiseXor_spec {n : Nat} (a b : Vector Nat n) :
  (bitwiseXor a b).toList.length = n ∧
  ∀ i : Fin n, (bitwiseXor a b)[i] = a[i] ^^^ b[i] :=
sorry

vc-preamble:
def Matrix (m n : Nat) (α : Type) := Fin m → Fin n → α

instance {m n : Nat} {α : Type} [Inhabited α] : GetElem (Matrix m n α) (Nat × Nat) α (fun _ ij => ij.1 < m ∧ ij.2 < n) where
  getElem mat ij h := mat ⟨ij.1, h.1⟩ ⟨ij.2, h.2⟩

def Matrix.size {m n : Nat} {α : Type} (_ : Matrix m n α) : Nat := m * n
vc-definitions:
def broadcast {n : Nat} (a : Vector Int n) (shape : Vector Nat 2) : Matrix (shape[0]!) (shape[1]!) Int :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem broadcast_spec {n : Nat} (a : Vector Int n) (shape : Vector Nat 2)
  (h : shape[0]! = n ∨ shape[1]! = n) :
  let ret := broadcast a shape
  (ret.size = shape[0]! * shape[1]!) ∧
  (∀ i j : Nat, i < shape[0]! → j < shape[1]! →
    if shape[0]! = n then ret[(i,j)]! = a[i]! else ret[(i,j)]! = a[j]!) :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def center {n : Nat} (input : Vector String n) (width : Nat) : Vector String n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem center_spec {n : Nat} (input : Vector String n) (width : Nat)
  (h : ∀ i : Fin n, input[i].length ≥ 1) :
  let res := center input width
  (res.toList.length = n) ∧
  (∀ i : Fin n, if input[i].length > width then res[i].length = input[i].length else res[i].length = width) ∧
  (∀ i : Fin n, if input[i].length < width then
    let startPos := (width - input[i].length + 1) / 2
    let endPos := startPos + input[i].length - 1
    res[i].toList.drop startPos |>.take input[i].length = input[i].toList else True) :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def clip {n : Nat} (a : Vector Float n) (min max : Float) : Vector Float n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem clip_spec {n : Nat} (a : Vector Float n) (min max : Float)
  (h : min < max) :
  let ret := clip a min max
  (ret.toList.length = n) ∧
  (∀ i : Fin n, if a[i] < min then ret[i] = min
               else if a[i] > max then ret[i] = max
               else ret[i] = a[i]) :=
sorry

vc-preamble:
def Matrix (m n : Nat) (α : Type) := Fin m → Fin n → α

instance {m n : Nat} {α : Type} [Inhabited α] : GetElem (Matrix m n α) (Nat × Nat) α (fun _ ij => ij.1 < m ∧ ij.2 < n) where
  getElem mat ij h := mat ⟨ij.1, h.1⟩ ⟨ij.2, h.2⟩

def Matrix.size {m n : Nat} {α : Type} (_ : Matrix m n α) : Nat := m * n
vc-definitions:
def column_stack {m n : Nat} (input : Vector (Vector Int m) n) : Matrix m n Int :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem column_stack_spec {m n : Nat} (input : Vector (Vector Int m) n)
  (h1 : n ≠ 0)
  (h2 : ∀ i : Fin n, input[i].size = m) :
  let ret := column_stack input
  (ret.size = m * n) ∧
  (∀ i : Nat, ∀ j : Nat, i < n → j < m → ret[(j,i)]! = input[i]![j]!) :=
sorry

theorem convolve_spec (arr1 arr2 : List Float)
  (h1 : arr1.length > 0)
  (h2 : arr2.length > 0) :
  let result := convolve arr1 arr2
  result.length = arr1.length + arr2.length - 1 :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def copy {n : Nat} (arr : Vector Int n) : Vector Int n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem copy_spec {n : Nat} (arr : Vector Int n) :
  (copy arr).toList.length = n ∧
  ∀ i : Fin n, (copy arr)[i] = arr[i] :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def nonzero {n : Nat} (arr : Vector Float n) : Nat :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem nonzero_spec {n : Nat} (arr : Vector Float n) :
  let num := nonzero arr
  (num ≥ 0) ∧
  (n > 0 → arr[0]! = 0.0 → nonzero (arr.tail) = num - 1) :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def cumProd {n : Nat} (a : Vector Int n) : Vector Int n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem cumProd_spec {n : Nat} (h : n > 0) (a : Vector Int n) :
  (cumProd a)[0] = a[0] ∧
  ∀ i : Fin n, i.val > 0 →
    let j : Fin n := ⟨i.val - 1, by sorry⟩
    (cumProd a)[i] = (cumProd a)[j] * a[i] :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def cumSum {n : Nat} (a : Vector Int n) : Vector Int n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem cumSum_spec {n : Nat} (h : n > 0) (a : Vector Int n) :
  (cumSum a)[0] = a[0] ∧
  ∀ i : Fin n, i.val > 0 →
    let j : Fin n := ⟨i.val - 1, by sorry⟩
    (cumSum a)[i] = (cumSum a)[j] + a[i] :=
sorry

vc-preamble:
def Matrix (m n : Nat) (α : Type) := Fin m → Fin n → α

instance {m n : Nat} {α : Type} [Inhabited α] : GetElem (Matrix m n α) (Nat × Nat) α (fun _ ij => ij.1 < m ∧ ij.2 < n) where
  getElem mat ij h := mat ⟨ij.1, h.1⟩ ⟨ij.2, h.2⟩

def Matrix.size {m n : Nat} {α : Type} (_ : Matrix m n α) : Nat := m * n
vc-definitions:
def diagonal {n : Nat} (arr : Matrix n n Int) (k : Int) : Vector Int (if k > 0 then n - k.natAbs else n + k.natAbs) :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem diagonal_spec {n : Nat} (arr : Matrix n n Int) (k : Int)
  (h1 : -n < k ∧ k < n) :
  let ret := diagonal arr k
  (if k > 0 then ret.size = n - k.natAbs else ret.size = n + k.natAbs) ∧
  (∀ i : Nat, i < ret.size →
    if k ≥ 0 then ret[i]! = arr[(i, i + k.natAbs)]!
    else ret[i]! = arr[(i + k.natAbs, i)]!) :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def equal {n : Nat} (a b : Vector Int n) : Vector Bool n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem equal_spec {n : Nat} (a b : Vector Int n) :
  (equal a b).toList.length = n ∧
  ∀ i : Fin n, (equal a b)[i] = (a[i] = b[i]) :=
sorry

vc-preamble:
def Matrix (m n : Nat) (α : Type) := Fin m → Fin n → α

instance {m n : Nat} {α : Type} [Inhabited α] : GetElem (Matrix m n α) (Nat × Nat) α (fun _ ij => ij.1 < m ∧ ij.2 < n) where
  getElem mat ij h := mat ⟨ij.1, h.1⟩ ⟨ij.2, h.2⟩

def Matrix.size {m n : Nat} {α : Type} (_ : Matrix m n α) : Nat := m * n
vc-definitions:
def flatten2 {m n : Nat} (mat : Matrix m n Int) : Vector Int (m * n) :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem flatten2_spec {m n : Nat} (mat : Matrix m n Int)
  (h1 : m > 0)
  (h2 : n > 0) :
  let ret := flatten2 mat
  (ret.size = m * n) ∧
  (∀ i j : Nat, i < m → j < n → ret[i * n + j]! = mat[(i,j)]!) :=
sorry

vc-preamble: def NonZeroVector (n : Nat) := { v : Vector Int n // ∀ i : Fin n, v[i] ≠ 0 }
vc-definitions:
def floorDivide {n : Nat} (a : Vector Int n) (b : NonZeroVector n) : Vector Int n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem floorDivide_spec {n : Nat} (a : Vector Int n) (b : NonZeroVector n) :
  (floorDivide a b).toList.length = n ∧
  ∀ i : Fin n, (floorDivide a b)[i] = a[i] / (b.val[i]) :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def gcdInt (a b : Int) : Int :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem gcdInt_spec (a b : Int) :
  gcdInt a b ≥ 0 ∧
  a % gcdInt a b = 0 ∧
  b % gcdInt a b = 0 ∧
  ∀ d : Int, d > 0 → a % d = 0 → b % d = 0 → d ≤ gcdInt a b :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def greater {n : Nat} (a b : Vector Int n) : Vector Bool n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem greater_spec {n : Nat} (a b : Vector Int n) :
  (greater a b).toList.length = n ∧
  ∀ i : Fin n, (greater a b)[i] = (a[i] > b[i]) :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def greaterEqual {n : Nat} (a b : Vector Int n) : Vector Bool n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem greaterEqual_spec {n : Nat} (a b : Vector Int n) :
  (greaterEqual a b).toList.length = n ∧
  ∀ i : Fin n, (greaterEqual a b)[i] = (a[i] ≥ b[i]) :=
sorry

theorem histogram_spec {n m : Nat} (data : Vector Float n) (bins : Vector Float m)
  (h1 : m ≥ 2)
  (h2 : ∀ i : Fin (m - 1), bins[i.succ] > bins[i]) :
  let hist := histogram data bins
  (hist.toList.length = m - 1) ∧
  (n ≥ 0) :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def intersect {n m : Nat} (a : Vector Float n) (b : Vector Float m) : Vector Float (min n m) :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem intersect_spec {n m : Nat} (a : Vector Float n) (b : Vector Float m) :
  let ret := intersect a b
  (ret.toList.length < n ∧ ret.toList.length < m) ∧
  (∀ i j : Nat, i < n → j < m →
    (a[i]! = b[j]! → ∃ k : Nat, k < ret.toList.length ∧ ret[k]! = a[i]!) ∧
    (a[i]! ≠ b[j]! → ¬ ∃ k : Nat, k < ret.toList.length ∧ ret[k]! = a[i]!)) :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def invert {n : Nat} (bitWidth : Nat) (a : Vector Nat n) : Vector Nat n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem invert_spec {n : Nat} (bitWidth : Nat) (a : Vector Nat n) :
  (invert bitWidth a).toList.length = n ∧
  ∀ i : Fin n, (invert bitWidth a)[i] = (2^bitWidth - 1) - a[i] :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def isAlpha {n : Nat} (input : Vector String n) : Vector Bool n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem isAlpha_spec {n : Nat} (input : Vector String n) :
  let ret := isAlpha input
  (ret.toList.length = n) ∧
  (∀ i : Fin n, ret[i] = (input[i].length > 0 ∧
    input[i].all fun c => ('A' ≤ c ∧ c ≤ 'Z') ∨ ('a' ≤ c ∧ c ≤ 'z'))) :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def np_isclose {n : Nat} (a b : Vector Int n) (tol : Int) : Vector Bool n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem np_isclose_spec {n : Nat} (a b : Vector Int n) (tol : Int)
  (h1 : n > 0)
  (h2 : tol > 0) :
  let ret := np_isclose a b tol
  (ret.toList.length = n) ∧
  (∀ i : Fin n, if -tol < a[i] - b[i] ∧ a[i] - b[i] < tol then ret[i] = true else ret[i] = false) :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def lcmInt (a b : Int) : Int :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem lcmInt_spec (a b : Int) :
  lcmInt a b ≥ 0 ∧
  lcmInt a b % a = 0 ∧
  lcmInt a b % b = 0 ∧
  ∀ m : Int, m > 0 → m % a = 0 → m % b = 0 → lcmInt a b ≤ m :=
sorry

theorem leftShift_spec {n : Nat} (a : Vector Int n) (b : Vector Nat n)
    (h : ∀ i : Fin n, b[i] < 64) :
  (leftShift a b h).toList.length = n ∧
  ∀ i : Fin n, (leftShift a b h)[i] = shiftLeftInt (a[i]) (b[i]) :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def less {n : Nat} (a b : Vector Int n) : Vector Bool n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem less_spec {n : Nat} (a b : Vector Int n) :
  (less a b).toList.length = n ∧
  ∀ i : Fin n, (less a b)[i] = (a[i] < b[i]) :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def lessEqual {n : Nat} (a b : Vector Int n) : Vector Bool n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem lessEqual_spec {n : Nat} (a b : Vector Int n) :
  (lessEqual a b).toList.length = n ∧
  ∀ i : Fin n, (lessEqual a b)[i] = (a[i] ≤ b[i]) :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def max {n : Nat} (h : n > 0) (a : Vector Int n) : Int :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem max_spec {n : Nat} (h : n > 0) (a : Vector Int n) :
  ∃ i : Fin n, max h a = a[i] ∧
  ∀ i : Fin n, a[i] ≤ max h a :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def min {n : Nat} (h : n > 0) (a : Vector Int n) : Int :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem min_spec {n : Nat} (h : n > 0) (a : Vector Int n) :
  ∃ i : Fin n, min h a = a[i] ∧
  ∀ i : Fin n, min h a ≤ a[i] :=
sorry

vc-preamble: def NonZeroVector (n : Nat) := { v : Vector Int n // ∀ i : Fin n, v[i] ≠ 0 }
vc-definitions:
def mod {n : Nat} (a : Vector Int n) (b : NonZeroVector n) : Vector Int n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem mod_spec {n : Nat} (a : Vector Int n) (b : NonZeroVector n) :
  (mod a b).toList.length = n ∧
  ∀ i : Fin n, (mod a b)[i] = a[i] % (b.val[i]) :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def multiply {n : Nat} (a b : Vector Int n) : Vector Int n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem multiply_spec {n : Nat} (a b : Vector Int n) :
  (multiply a b).toList.length = n ∧
  ∀ i : Fin n, (multiply a b)[i] = a[i] * b[i] :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def notEqual {n : Nat} (a b : Vector Int n) : Vector Bool n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem notEqual_spec {n : Nat} (a b : Vector Int n) :
  (notEqual a b).toList.length = n ∧
  ∀ i : Fin n, (notEqual a b)[i] = (a[i] ≠ b[i]) :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def piecewise {n m : Nat} (x : Vector Float n) (condlist : Vector (Float → Bool) m) (funclist : Vector (Float → Float) m) : Vector Float n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem piecewise_spec {n m : Nat} (x : Vector Float n) (condlist : Vector (Float → Bool) m) (funclist : Vector (Float → Float) m)
  (h : m = m) :
  let ret := piecewise x condlist funclist
  (ret.toList.length = n) ∧
  (∀ i j : Nat, i < n → j < m →
    condlist[j]! (x[i]!) → ret[i]! = funclist[j]! (x[i]!)) :=
sorry

theorem poly_spec {n : Nat} (roots : Vector Float n)
  (h : n > 0) :
  let coeff := poly roots
  (coeff.toList.length = n) ∧
  (∀ i : Fin n, coeff[i] = (poly_helper roots (n - 1))[i]) :=
sorry

theorem poly_helper_spec {n : Nat} (roots : Vector Float n) (val : Nat)
  (h1 : n > 0)
  (h2 : val > 0) :
  let coeff := poly_helper roots val
  (coeff.toList.length = n) ∧
  (coeff[0]! = 1.0) :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def polyder {n : Nat} (poly : Vector Float n) (m : Int) : Vector Float (n - m.natAbs) :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem polyder_spec {n : Nat} (poly : Vector Float n) (m : Int)
  (h : m > 0) :
  let ret := polyder poly m
  ret.toList.length = n - m.natAbs :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def power {n : Nat} (a : Vector Int n) (b : Vector Nat n) : Vector Int n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem power_spec {n : Nat} (a : Vector Int n) (b : Vector Nat n) :
  (power a b).toList.length = n ∧
  ∀ i : Fin n, (power a b)[i] = (a[i]) ^ (b[i]) :=
sorry

theorem prod_spec {n : Nat} (a : Vector Int n) :
  prod a = prodArray a 0 n ∧
  (∀ i : Fin n, a[i] = 0 → prod a = 0) :=
sorry

vc-preamble:
def Matrix (m n : Nat) (α : Type) := Fin m → Fin n → α

instance {m n : Nat} {α : Type} [Inhabited α] : GetElem (Matrix m n α) (Nat × Nat) α (fun _ ij => ij.1 < m ∧ ij.2 < n) where
  getElem mat ij h := mat ⟨ij.1, h.1⟩ ⟨ij.2, h.2⟩

def Matrix.size {m n : Nat} {α : Type} (_ : Matrix m n α) : Nat := m * n
vc-definitions:
def ravel {m n : Nat} (arr : Matrix m n Int) : Vector Int (m * n) :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem ravel_spec {m n : Nat} (arr : Matrix m n Int) :
  let ret := ravel arr
  (ret.size = m * n) ∧
  (∀ i j : Nat, i < m → j < n → ret[i * n + j]! = arr[(i,j)]!) :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def remainder {n : Nat} (a b : Vector Int n) : Vector Int n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem remainder_spec {n : Nat} (a b : Vector Int n)
  (h : ∀ i : Fin n, b[i] ≠ 0) :
  let ret := remainder a b
  (ret.toList.length = n) ∧
  (∀ i : Fin n, ret[i] = a[i] % b[i]) :=
sorry

vc-preamble:
def Matrix (m n : Nat) (α : Type) := Fin m → Fin n → α

instance {m n : Nat} {α : Type} [Inhabited α] : GetElem (Matrix m n α) (Nat × Nat) α (fun _ ij => ij.1 < m ∧ ij.2 < n) where
  getElem mat ij h := mat ⟨ij.1, h.1⟩ ⟨ij.2, h.2⟩

def Matrix.size {m n : Nat} {α : Type} (_ : Matrix m n α) : Nat := m * n
vc-definitions:
def reshape {n : Nat} (arr : Vector Int n) (shape : Vector Nat 2) : Matrix (if shape[0]! > 0 then shape[0]! else n / shape[1]!) (if shape[1]! > 0 then shape[1]! else n / shape[0]!) Int :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem reshape_spec {n : Nat} (arr : Vector Int n) (shape : Vector Nat 2)
  (h1 : ∀ i : Fin 2, shape[i] > 0 ∨ shape[i] = 0)
  (h2 : ¬(shape[0]! = 0 ∧ shape[1]! = 0))
  (h3 : if shape[0]! > 0 ∧ shape[1]! > 0 then shape[0]! * shape[1]! = n
        else if shape[0]! = 0 then n % shape[1]! = 0
        else n % shape[0]! = 0) :
  let ret := reshape arr shape
  (if shape[0]! > 0 then ret.size / (if shape[1]! > 0 then shape[1]! else n / shape[0]!) = shape[0]!
   else ret.size / (if shape[1]! > 0 then shape[1]! else n / shape[0]!) = n / shape[1]!) ∧
  (∀ i : Nat, i < n → ret[(i / ret.size, i % ret.size)]! = arr[i]!) :=
sorry

vc-preamble:
def shiftRightInt (x : Int) (n : Nat) : Int :=
  if x ≥ 0 then
    Int.ofNat (x.natAbs >>> n)
  else
    -(Int.ofNat (((-x).natAbs - 1) >>> n + 1))
vc-theorems:
theorem rightShift_spec {n : Nat} (a : Vector Int n) (b : Vector Nat n)
  (h : ∀ i : Fin n, b[i] < 64) :
  (rightShift a b h).toList.length = n ∧
  ∀ i : Fin n, (rightShift a b h)[i] = shiftRightInt (a[i]) (b[i]) :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def select {m n : Nat} (condlist : Vector (Vector Bool n) m) (choicelist : Vector (Vector Float n) m) : Vector Float n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem select_spec {m n : Nat} (condlist : Vector (Vector Bool n) m) (choicelist : Vector (Vector Float n) m)
  (h1 : m > 0 ∧ n > 0)
  (h2 : ∀ i : Fin m, condlist[i].toList.length = n ∧ choicelist[i].toList.length = n) :
  let ret := select condlist choicelist
  (ret.toList.length = n) ∧
  (∀ i : Fin m, ∀ j : Fin n, condlist[i][j] → ret[j] = choicelist[i][j]) :=
sorry

vc-preamble:
def Matrix (m n : Nat) (α : Type) := Fin m → Fin n → α

instance {m n : Nat} {α : Type} [Inhabited α] : GetElem (Matrix m n α) (Nat × Nat) α (fun _ ij => ij.1 < m ∧ ij.2 < n) where
  getElem mat ij h := mat ⟨ij.1, h.1⟩ ⟨ij.2, h.2⟩

def Matrix.size {m n : Nat} {α : Type} (_ : Matrix m n α) : Nat := m * n

inductive arrays where
  | arrayOne : Array Float → arrays
  | arrayTwo : Array (Array Float) → arrays
  | arrayThree : Array (Array (Array Float)) → arrays
vc-theorems:
theorem shape''_spec (a : arrays) :
  let ret := shape'' a
  match a with
  | .arrayOne arr => ret.toList.length = 1 ∧ ret[0]! = arr.toList.length
  | .arrayTwo arr => ret.toList.length = 2 ∧ ret[0]! = arr.toList.length ∧ ret[1]! = (if arr.toList.length > 0 then arr[0]!.toList.length else 0)
  | .arrayThree arr => ret.toList.length = 3 ∧ ret[0]! = arr.size ∧ ret[1]! = (if arr.size > 0 then arr[0]!.size else 0) ∧ ret[2]! = (if arr.size > 0 ∧ arr[0]!.size > 0 then arr[0]![0]!.size else 0) :=
sorry

theorem shape_spec {m n : Nat} (a : Matrix m n Float) :
  let ret := shape a
  (ret.toList.length = 2) ∧
  (ret[0]! = m ∧ ret[1]! = n) :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def sign {n : Nat} (a : Vector Int n) : Vector Int n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem sign_spec {n : Nat} (a : Vector Int n) :
  (sign a).toList.length = n ∧
  ∀ i : Fin n,
    (a[i] > 0 → (sign a)[i] = 1) ∧
    (a[i] = 0 → (sign a)[i] = 0) ∧
    (a[i] < 0 → (sign a)[i] = -1) :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def sort {n : Nat} (a : Vector Float n) : Vector Float n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem sort_spec {n : Nat} (a : Vector Float n) :
  (sort a).toList.length = n ∧
  (∀ i j : Fin n, i < j → (sort a)[i] ≤ (sort a)[j]) ∧
  (∀ x : Float, (sort a).toList.count x = a.toList.count x) :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def square {n : Nat} (arr : Vector Int n) : Vector Int n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem square_spec {n : Nat} (arr : Vector Int n) :
  (square arr).toList.length = n ∧
  ∀ i : Fin n, (square arr)[i] = (arr[i]) * (arr[i]) :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def subtract {n : Nat} (a b : Vector Int n) : Vector Int n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem subtract_spec {n : Nat} (a b : Vector Int n) :
  (subtract a b).toList.length = n ∧
  ∀ i : Fin n, (subtract a b)[i] = a[i] - b[i] :=
sorry

theorem sum_spec {n : Nat} (a : Vector Int n) :
  sum a = sumArray a 0 n ∧
  ∀ start finish : Nat, start ≤ finish → finish ≤ n →
    sumArray a start finish = (List.range (finish - start)).foldl (fun acc i => acc + a[start + i]'sorry) 0 ∧
  ∀ m n : Nat, ∀ a : Vector Int m, ∀ b : Vector Int n, sum (a ++ b) = sum a + sum b :=
sorry

vc-preamble:
def Matrix (m n : Nat) (α : Type) := Fin m → Fin n → α

instance {m n : Nat} {α : Type} [Inhabited α] : GetElem (Matrix m n α) (Nat × Nat) α (fun _ ij => ij.1 < m ∧ ij.2 < n) where
  getElem mat ij h := mat ⟨ij.1, h.1⟩ ⟨ij.2, h.2⟩

def Matrix.size {m n : Nat} {α : Type} (_ : Matrix m n α) : Nat := m * n
vc-definitions:
def transpose {m n : Nat} (arr : Matrix m n Int) : Matrix n m Int :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem transpose_spec {m n : Nat} (arr : Matrix m n Int) :
  let ret := transpose arr
  (ret.size = n * m) ∧
  (∀ i j : Nat, i < m → j < n → ret[(j,i)]! = arr[(i,j)]!) :=
sorry

vc-preamble:
def Matrix (m n : Nat) (α : Type) := Fin m → Fin n → α

instance {m n : Nat} {α : Type} [Inhabited α] : GetElem (Matrix m n α) (Nat × Nat) α (fun _ ij => ij.1 < m ∧ ij.2 < n) where
  getElem mat ij h := mat ⟨ij.1, h.1⟩ ⟨ij.2, h.2⟩

def Matrix.size {m n : Nat} {α : Type} (_ : Matrix m n α) : Nat := m * n
vc-definitions:
def tril {m n : Nat} (arr : Matrix m n Int) (k : Int) : Matrix m n Int :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem tril_spec {m n : Nat} (arr : Matrix m n Int) (k : Int)
  (h : -m + 1 < k ∧ k < n - 1) :
  let ret := tril arr k
  (ret.size = m * n) ∧
  (∀ i j : Nat, i < m → j < n →
    if j - i > k then ret[(i,j)]! = 0 else ret[(i,j)]! = arr[(i,j)]!) :=
sorry

vc-definitions:
def unique_all {n : Nat} (arr : Vector Int n) : Vector Int n :=
sorry
vc-theorems:
theorem unique_all_spec {n : Nat} (arr : Vector Int n) :
  let ret := unique_all arr
  (ret.toList.length ≤ n) ∧
  (∀ i : Fin n, ∃ j : Nat, j < ret.toList.length ∧ ret[j]! = arr[i]) ∧
  (∀ i j : Nat, i < ret.toList.length → j < i → ret[i]! ≠ ret[j]!) :=
sorry

theorem where_spec {n : Nat} (condition : Vector Bool n) (x : Vector Int n) (y : Vector Int n) :
  («where» condition x y).toList.length = n ∧
  ∀ i : Fin n, («where» condition x y)[i] = (if condition[i] then x[i] else y[i]) ∧
  ∀ arr : Vector Int n, ∀ condition : Int → Bool, ∀ change : Int → Int,
    (whereWithTransform arr condition change).toList.length = n ∧
    ∀ i : Fin n, (whereWithTransform arr condition change)[i] =
      if condition (arr[i]) then change (arr[i]) else arr[i] :=
sorry

theorem zeros_spec (n : Nat) :
  ∀ i : Fin n, (zeros n)[i.val] = 0 ∧
  ∀ rows cols : Nat, ∀ (i : Fin rows) (j : Fin cols), (zeros2d rows cols)[i.val][j.val] = 0 :=
sorry
